title: Cancer Victims Challenge Johnson & Johnson’s Talc Bankruptcy: What to Know
sub_head: The company has isolated its talc liabilities in a subsidiary and put them in bankruptcy, an emerging legal strategy to drive settlements of mass-injury lawsuits
body:
Johnson & Johnson has put thousands of personal-injury claims over talcum-based baby powder into bankruptcy, hoping to drive settlements with victims of ovarian cancer and mesothelioma. A bankruptcy judge is considering talc plaintiffs’ request to dismiss the chapter 11 case, which J&J opposes.
